blogPost.excerpt: Hacker News Front Page Explorer is a database of Ranked Hacker News Front Page posts. Some Example Use Cases:- - find ways to rank your post on the Front Page - discover top trends in HN Community. - build an App using this data

localize.description: 黑客新闻头版资源管理器是一个排名的黑客新闻头版帖子的数据库。一些示例用例：--找到在首页对您的帖子进行排名的方法--发现HN社区的热门趋势。-使用此数据构建应用程序

previous.excerpt: Squat is also called full squat. It is one of the most complex and practiced movements in bodybuilding. It is also a movement in powerlifting competitions. This is an app that automatically records the number of squats through sensors.
previous.title: Daily Squat Workout App - Fitness app to track your squat workout

localize.description: 蹲式也叫全蹲。它是健美比赛中最复杂、练习量最大的动作之一。它也是力量举比赛中的一个动作。这是一款通过传感器自动记录下蹲次数的应用。
localize.tagline: 追踪你的下蹲训练的健身应用

localize.description: 蹲式也叫全蹲。它是健美比賽中最複雜、練習量最大的動作之一。它也是力量舉比賽中的一個動作。這是一款通過傳感器自動記錄下蹲次數的應用。
localize.tagline: 追蹤你的下蹲訓練的健身應用

next.excerpt: We have built a tool for developers and businesses in Africa to engage thier customers via different messaging channels like SMS,Voice,Email,Whatsapp We currently have built APIs for devs to integrate and working on no-code tools for business owners.
next.title: Sendchamp - Multi-channel messaging tool for devs & businesses in Africa

localize.description: 我们已经为非洲的开发人员和企业建立了一个工具，通过不同的消息渠道，如短信，语音，电子邮件，Whatsapp吸引客户。
